item.title: Health insurers vow to speed approval of medical care
item.description: Some of the nation's health insurers say they're taking steps to speed the process by which doctors approve medical care.

item.title: U.S. embassy warns Americans in Qatar to shelter in place
item.description: "Out of an abundance of caution we recommend American citizens shelter in place until further notice," the U.S. Embassy in Doha, Qatar, said.

item.title: May 19: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Russia launches its largest drone attack on Ukraine; "60 Minutes" looks at how A.I. and autonomous weapons have changed face of modern war.

item.title: Compass sues Zillow over its "Zillow ban," alleging antitrust breach
item.description: Real estate company Compass claims Zillow is illegally undermining competition by banning property listings if they don't appear on Zillow within 24 h...

item.title: ICE detains Marine vet's wife who was still breastfeeding their baby
item.description: ICE officers detained the wife of a Marine Corps veteran in Louisiana during a routine immigration appointment.
